title: CA, Delaware attorneys general concerned about OpenAI
description: Bonta’s office said the attorney general is looking into the San Francisco artificial intelligence company’s financial and governance restructuring.
content: In addition, Bonta and Delaware Attorney General Kathleen Jennings met with OpenAI’s legal team and wrote a joint letter to the company about a growing number of reports about how OpenAI’s products interact with children. While its headquarters is in... [2300 chars]

title: BitHarvest - Investor Briefing Document for a better idea
description: Executive Summary BitHarvest is a fast-growing Web3 infrastructure and AI technology company founded in 2023, with operations in Malaysia. We’re pioneering a next-generation blockchain and mining ecosystem that integrates artificial intelligence, decentralized finance, and real-world crypto utility. Our flagship offerings—including BitBooster, HarvestAI Chain, and the $BTH token—enable high-performance crypto mining, AI monetization, and scalable dApp development. With over 100,000 users, […]

title: Who really benefits from AI?
description: Artificial intelligence must be not only efficient but just, writes Shahin Hossain.
content: Not long ago, a man in Detroit, Robert Williams, was wrongfully arrested for a crime he did not commit. The Detroit police had relied on facial recognition software that misidentified him. The algorithm was efficient, but it was wrong, and the innoce... [4421 chars]

title: AI've Got A Co-Author
description: From ChatGPT drafts to short stories and even poetry, many writers are using Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools for creative works
content: There was a time when a writer’s worst enemy was the blinking cursor. That maddening vertical line mocked you, daring you to produce a sentence worthy of the blank page. Today, the cursor still blinks—but now, it doesn’t blink alone. On the other sid... [5655 chars]

title: Here's How Much More AI-Skilled Workers Make
description: We looked at three different studies to see just how much more artificial intelligence skills will pay.
content:
Employers are increasingly offering pay boosts for workers with artificial intelligence skills, even in roles beyond tech. How much more? We looked at three different studies to see just how much more artificial intelligence skills will pay.

title: AI helps older adults report accurate blood pressure readings at home
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) voice agents helped older adults with high blood pressure to accurately report their blood pressure readings and improved blood pressure management, according to preliminary research presented at the American Heart Association's Hypertension Scientific Sessions 2025 held in Baltimore, September 4–7, 2025.

title: Indian-American Techie Weighs In On Impact Of Artificial Intelligence On Software Development
description: The techie states that while AI will continue to automate routine tasks, human engineers will remain crucial for complex problem-solving.
content:
